thread.section_title: The Roger - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great little hotel
thread.title_full: Great little hotel - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: trevorn865
title: Great little hotel
text:
I was over for a week and working in Midtown. The Roger was perfect. Great location, yet unlike so many New York Hotels I have stayed in the past I found it quiet and a haven from the bustle outside. It may be the City that never sleeps, but certainly I would like to have the chance, the Roger gave me that.
In truth I did not use that many of the facilities, but the room was great and all the staff that I came into contact with were excellent. Breakfast was great for me.
I hope to stay here again soon.
